metadata.title: CVE-2023-5198 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions prior to16.2.7, all versions starting from 16.3 before 16.3.5, and all versionsstarting from 16.4 before 16.4.1. It was possible for a removed projectmember to write to protected branches using deploy keys.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
